Other libraries support layer

Header <boost/sync/support/boost_chrono.hpp>
Header <boost/sync/support/boost_date_time.hpp>
Header <boost/sync/support/posix_time.hpp>
Header <boost/sync/support/std_chrono.hpp>

Header <boost/sync/support/boost_chrono.hpp>

This header enables support for Boost.Chrono time units.

Header <boost/sync/support/boost_date_time.hpp>

This header enables support for Boost.DateTime time units.

Header <boost/sync/support/posix_time.hpp>

This header enables support for POSIX time units.

Header <boost/sync/support/std_chrono.hpp>

This header enables support for std::chrono time units.
